meanings.definition: A rising and falling in waves.
meanings.sent1: The undulations of the ocean were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The undulations of the sand dunes created a beautiful pattern in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The undulations of the roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The undulations of the music filled the room with a sense of movement and rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The undulations of the dancer's body were graceful and fluid.

meanings.sent1: The undulations of the hills in the distance gave the landscape a gentle appearance.
meanings.sent2: The undulations of the fabric created an interesting texture in the design.
meanings.sent3: The undulations of the road ahead made it look like a giant snake winding through the countryside.
meanings.sent4: The undulations of the clouds in the sky resembled a soft, fluffy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The undulations of the painting added depth and movement to the artwork.
